quote_first:
He turned around and asked the youth, “What’s the time?” The young man looked proudly at his new acquisition, which he hadn’t taken his eyes off for one moment.
“
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: It exploded much later than intended, probably a good twelve hours later, at
quote_last: on Monday morning. Several defunct wristwatches, the property of victims, confirmed the time. As with its predecessors over the last few months, there had been no warning.
title: The Little Drummer Girl
author: John le Carré
